Title: Creates the New York Civil Gideon Act
Summary: Creates the New York Civil Gideon Act.
LawCode: Add Art 18-C §§723 - 723-d, amd §§722 & 722-c, County L; amd §1303, RPAP L; amd §§227 & 261, V & T L; add §98-d, St Fin L; amd §468-a, Judy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, the real property actions and proceedings law, the vehicle and traffic law, the state finance law and the judiciary law, in relation to enacting the "NY Civil Gideon Act"
